title: You Are The One (Xiumin EXO-M)
lyrics: You are the one Sarangeul hago sipeun geol geudae barabolttaemyeon You are my destiny Ijeneun jogeum deo naege dagawa Love it you geu moseup joha Modeun geol da malhaejullae Saranghandago nappunirago haejwo Barame nallyeo gapjagi on deushan sarang Haengbogi mwonji alge hae jun Geudaeneun nae only one Show me the love and so i Will tell you at thit time Nae gwisgae soksagyeojullae saranghandago You are the one Sarangeul hago sipeun geol geudae barabolttaemyeon You are my destiny Ijeneun jogeum deo naege dagawa Love it you geu moseup joha Modeun geol da malhaejullae Saranghandago nappunirago haejwo
